about.title: About
about.subtitle: About Me
about.name: wine-5
about.description: I'm studying game development at a vocational school. I specialize in game development using Unity and C#.
about.fullDescription:
I'm a game developer aiming for the game industry.
I develop games using Unity and C#,
and strive for design that follows SOLID principles.
Recently, I've also been learning C++.
I have experience publishing on UnityRoom,
and pursue game development that brings joy to players.
My strength is enjoying programming more than anyone and continuously pursuing it.
about.timelineDescription: You can view detailed development history and project records from enrollment to present
